description.message: Increment a URL or go to the Next Page. Supports Auto and Download Incrementing. Uses 0 Chrome memory when inactive.

browser_shortcuts_p1.message: URLI is set to use Chrome Shortcuts.

browser_shortcuts_p2.message: Chrome Shortcuts support limited keys, but you can enable URLI's Internal Shortcuts to use any key or even mouse shortcuts! (requires permissions)

internal_shortcuts_p.message: URLI is set to use its internal shortcuts! Click on the text boxes and press the key(s) you'd like to set. Alt, Ctrl, Shift, and Meta keys can be used. You can also set mouse shortcuts and the number of clicks. "(Right) Left" means hold Right, click Left or vice-versa. If you're on a touch-screen device, select Left for Touch. Note: Due to a bug in Chrome, Internal Shortcuts do not work in Incognito Mode.

one_click_buttons_p.message: Accessing URLI's buttons requires 2 clicks, but you can add 1-Click buttons to your toolbar! They use 0 Chrome memory when inactive!

one_click_buttons_increment.message: 1-Click URL Increment Button for URLI (Chrome Web Store)

one_click_buttons_decrement.message: 1-Click URL Decrement Button for URLI (Chrome Web Store)

save_regexp_icon.message: This is a Saved Regular Expression

increment_decrement_h3.message: Select the part of the URL to Increment or Decrement

multi_button.message: Multi Incrementing - Click to increment up to 3 parts of the URL individually, simultaneously, or in ranges. See the Help Guide for more information.

toolkit_instructions.message: Select and configure a tool, then click on URLI to have the work performed.

toolkit_tip.message: If download is enabled, you can generate a list of links, open the HTML file, and then use URLI again or another downloader to download them all!

crawl_tip.message: Tip: There are 5 classes of HTTP response codes. Informational (1XX), Successful / OK (2XX), Redirections (3XX), Client Errors (4XX), and Server Errors (5XX). If an Exception is caught while fetching a URL, it will also be noted. To stop crawling at anytime, close this window.

auto_wait_label.message: Wait for the page to fully load

auto_badge_label.message: Show the times left in the icon

download_preview_blocked.message: Sorry, please wait a few more seconds ... scanning this page for URLs is either taking a really long time or URLI is not allowed to check for downloads on this page (e.g. browser pages). Please also try disabling and re-enabling Download again in the Options to make sure URLI has permissions.

download_help_extensions_title.message: These are the file extensions found on the page based on the URLs. If the URL doesn't contain the extension in it (e.g. .jpg), URLI won't find it. Important: Since these extensions are based only on the URL Strings (not the actual files), it's not guaranteed to be the file's true type.

download_help_tags_title.message: These are the HTML tags (e.g. ) that were found on the page.

download_help_attributes_title.message: These are the HTML tag attributes (e.g.

download_help_selector_title.message: This lets you directly use JavaScript's querySelectorAll() method on the entire document. You can use multiple CSS Selectors separated by commas for a more fine-grained selection.

download_help_page_title.message: Remember: This will only download the .html of the web page, unless the URL of the page points directly to a file (e.g. https://www.example.com/001.jpg)

download_optional_help.message: You can use text filters to include or exclude the URLs to download on each page. Multiple Includes and Excludes can be entered by separating them with commas.

download_subfolder_help.message: You can have each page's downloads stored in a subfolder under your root Downloads folder. Enter a subfolder name and include a starting number that will be incremented (if no number is entered, the same subfolder will be used for all pages). Important: When saving to subfolders, the download's file name and extension will be based on the URL (not on the server's own internal file name), so be sure to examine the "Name" and "Ext" columns in the preview table first. If a file is missing a name or extension, it will default to saving in the root Downloads folder instead.

selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters

selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be part of the URL

selection_toolarge_error.message: Selection is too large; please select a smaller number or fewer characters

selection_base_error.message: Select a higher base to match characters in selection

selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL

interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be greater than 0 and less than Max

error_skip_permissions_error.message: To Error Skip, please enable Enhanced Mode in Options or set it to 0

error_skip_invalid_error.message: Error Skip has to be between 0 and 100

base_custom_invalid_error.message: Custom base couldn't be validated against selection

base_decimal_invalid_error.message: A decimal number (in the format of #.#, e.g. "1.5") could not be parsed from the selection

multi_count_error.message: To multi-increment, select at least two selections in the URL

toolkit_auto_enabled_error.message: Can't use URLI's Toolkit while Auto is running; please use another tab or clear [X] and close and re-enter the Popup

toolkit_invalid_error.message: URLI's Toolkit configuration missing tool, action, or quantity

toolkit_crawl_quantity_error.message: Crawl URLs Quantity must be between 1 and 10,000

toolkit_crawl_seconds_error.message: Crawl URLs Seconds must be between 1 and 600

toolkit_crawl_permissions_error.message: To Crawl URLs, please enable Enhanced Mode in Options to give URLI permissions

toolkit_tabs_quantity_error.message: Open Tabs Quantity must be between 1 and 100

toolkit_tabs_seconds_error.message: Open Tabs Seconds must be between 0 and 5

toolkit_tabs_too_many_open_error.message: Too many tabs are open in this window (current tabs + quantity exceeds 100), please close some or open a new window

toolkit_links_quantity_error.message: Generate Links Quantity must be between 1 and 10,000

auto_next_prev_error.message: To use Next [>] Prev [<] with Auto, please enable Enhanced Mode in Options to give URLI permissions

auto_next_prev_shuffle_error.message: When using Auto with Next [>] Prev [<], shuffle can't be on

auto_times_invalid_error.message: Auto Times must be between 1 and 10,000

auto_seconds_invalid_error.message: Auto Seconds must be between 1 and 3,600

auto_download_seconds_error.message: When using Auto with Download, seconds must be 5 or higher

auto_download_repeat_error.message: When using Auto with Download, repeat can't be on

download_permissions_error.message: Please first enable Download in Options to give URLI permissions

download_subfolder_error.message: Download Subfolder can only contain the following characters: [A-Z] [0-9] _ - . or space

private_window_unsupported.message: Oops -- Sorry! URLI's Popup can't work properly in Private/Incognito Windows due to the browser disallowing an Extension's Popup to directly use its Background process in this mode. Shortcuts and 1-Click Buttons still work in Private/Incognito Windows and you can still use URLI's Popup in normal windows though!

help_quick_shortcuts.message: If Quick is enabled, you can Increment or perform other actions instantly without having to setup or save a URL (Except for Clear, Return to Start, and Auto Pause)

icon_feedback_enable_label.message: Enable icon feedback when performing actions

saved_urls_settings_p.message: Save your favorite URLs' settings such as selection and interval so you can use Quick Shortcuts when you visit them again without having to go into the Popup setup!

saved_urls_how_span.message: Important: Your privacy and how URLs are saved

saved_urls_how_title.message: To help keep your data as private as possible, URLI only stores irreversible cryptographic hashes of the full URLs, but potentially decryptable hashes of the Wildcards / Regular Expressions you save on your device. For more information, please view the Help Guide.

saved_urls_preselect_label.message: Always preselect the Save URL Heart in the Popup

saved_urls_wildcard_instructions_p.message: Enter a wildcard or regular expression to match multiple URLs, then adjust the Increment Decrement settings below for it, and click Save. Regular expressions should be surrounded by / characters. If using a custom selection, please test and save it first. After saving the wildcard, please adjust the settings back to you preferred defaults.

increment_decrement_settings_p.message: Change the way URLI pre-selects the number to increment and set default settings.

selection_option_prefixes.message: Select numbers like "page=1" in the URL

selection_option_lastnumber.message: Select the last number in the URL

selection_option_firstnumber.message: Select the first number in the URL

selection_custom_url_label.message: Test URL String (Required, note this is saved)

selection_custom_help_label.message: For more testing and help, use

selection_custom_matchgroup_error.message: Match found, but not in group entered

selection_custom_matchindex_error.message: Match found, but not in index entered

selection_custom_matchnotvalid_error.message: couldn't be validated against selection and current base (try adjusting index)

error_skip_description.message: This checks if the next URL will return an HTTP error code (like 404) and increments again, skipping it up to 100 times until it finds the next good URL. If an error is encountered, the extension icon will flash with the error code (or flash "RED" for redirects). Note that some websites may choose to not return an error code. You may notice a few seconds delay when error skipping. Set to 0 to disable it. Important: This will make a request to the server each time to check the status code, and setting this value too high might cause the server to issue a "Too Many Requests" response. A value of 10 or less should be reasonably OK. Also, Please Note: This requires Enhanced Mode to be enabled.

error_skip_disclaimer.message: Note: Error Skipping requires Enhanced Mode permissions.

next_prev_settings_p.message: Some URLs may not have numbers, so URLI can increment using Next Prev links on the page. Keywords are all lowercase, ordered in priority, and separated by commas.

next_prev_keywords_prev_textarea.message: e.g. pnprev,previous page,< prev,« prev,prev,previous,newer posts,newer,前,<,<,‹,←

next_prev_links_priority_innerHTML_optio.message: Prefer links with inner HTML like "Next" in them

next_prev_popup_buttons_description_labe.message: Show Next Prev buttons (Requires Enhanced Mode)

auto_settings_p.message: Relax and let URLI auto-increment! Start Auto anytime by toggling it in the Popup. It supports multiple tabs at the same time, pause/resume, and repeat.

toolkit_settings_p.message: Originally made to test URLI, but unlocked for you to use as a non-standard feature! Crawl URLs, open tabs, or generate links. Click the wrench in the Popup to open.

download_disable_p.message: This isn't just any downloader! Use it with Auto to create an Auto Incrementer Downloader! Click the button to enable (grant permissions).

download_enable_p.message: Download is enabled! Start Downloading anytime by toggling the "DL" in the Popup.

download_experimental_disclaimer.message: Remember: Download is still an experimental feature! Please only use it for small and simple downloading tasks while incrementing.

download_settings_disclaimer.message: Before downloading, please open your Browser Settings and make sure the "Ask where to save each file" is unchecked and you've set a Download location.

enhanced_mode_enable_p.message: Enhanced Mode is enabled! You can Error Skip, Crawl URLs with URLI's Toolkit, and use Next Prev with Auto or Buttons!

enhanced_mode_disable_p.message: This unlocks URLI to its full potential! It lets you Error Skip, Crawl URLs with URLI's Toolkit, and use Next Prev with Auto or Buttons. Click the button to enable (grant permissions).

support_a.message: Support - Problems or Suggestions? Email me!

help_a.message: Help - View the User Guide on GitHub

urli_thank_you_rainbow.message: Thank you for using URLI, a URL Incrementer

urli_thank_you_wish.message: I want you to be 100% happy with URLI, so please email if any issues! URLI loves incrementing for you and wishes you an Incrementful Day!

special_thanks_content.message: NickMWPrince & Gopi P (AUTO Concept), Coolio Wolfus (Ver 1.x Testing), Eric C (Alphanumeric Idea), URL Flipper (Firefox), FontAwesome (Icons), Hover.css (Animations), @mallendeo (Toggles), Mike West (Dialogs), The Chromium Authors (Styles), ZURB Foundation (Styles / Tables), tinypng.com (Compression), regex101.com (Regex Test), httpstat.us (Error Skipping Test), Stack Overflow Users (Internal Code), ...

special_thanks_you.message: ... and most of all you for using URLI!
